product.title: User Moderating Options
product.description: This product allows staff to edit user's avatar, profile picture, signature & album pictures inside forums without logging to AdminCP/ModCP, Administrators also has the ability to control which user groups allowed to manage others accounts.

templates.template:

phrasetype.name: Permissions
phrasetype.phrase: Can Upload Animated GIF for Signature
Can Be Moderated<dfn>(If set to "yes" then other usergroups that have permissions to moderate user's options will be able to moderate this usergroups' user's options, otherwise they can't.)</dfn>

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase:
Sorry, you don't have permission to access the administrative controls on this page.

If you need to access this page, ask your lead administrator to enable your permissions for this page using the "Usergroup Permissions" section of the control panel.
The administrator has disabled the use of profile pictures.
Pruned User Moderating Options Log Successfully
It's not permitted for the user to edit {1}
Sorry, {1} has no permission to upload signature picture.
Sorry, this user belongs to a usergroup that is protected from being altered.
{1} does not has enough posts to use this avatar. Please select another.
You have used a censored word. Please remove this word.
User Moderating Options log pruning permission restricted.
You are not authorized to edit user's avatars
You are not authorized to edit user's profile pictures
You are not authorized to edit user's signatures
You are not authorized to edit album pictures
Sorry, {1} is not permitted to have a signature.
You may not delete {1}'s signature picture while it is in use in his signature.
{1}'s signature cannot be longer than {2} characters excluding BB code markup.
{1}'s signature cannot be longer than {2} characters including BB code markup.
{1}'s signature contains too many lines and must be shortened. {1} may only have up to {2} line(s). Long text may have been implicitly wrapped, causing it to be counted as multiple lines.

You have included {1} images in {2}'s signature. {2} is limited to using {3} images so please go back and correct the problem and then continue again.

Images include use of smilies, the BB code [img] tag and HTML <img> tags. The use of these is all subject to them being enabled by the administrator.

phrasetype.name: GLOBAL
phrasetype.phrase: The following errors occurred with your submission
Option 2 - Upload Image From Your Computer
<input class="button" onclick="vbform.avatarurl.value = '{1}'; check_yes('avatar_yes'); javascript:document.vbform.submit();" type="button" value="Post violating avatar">
<input class="button" onclick="vbform.avatarurl.value = '{1}'; javascript:document.vbform.submit();" type="button" value="Post violating profile picture.">
<input class="button" onclick="vbform.message.value = vbform.message.value + '\n{1}'; javascript:document.vbform.submit();" type="button" value="Post violating signature content.">

phrasetype.name: Logging Tools
phrasetype.phrase: Are you sure you want to prune {1} log entries from the moderator log?
USERMO Log Viewer (page {1}/{2}) | There are {3} total log entries.

phrasetype.name: Plugin System
phrasetype.phrase: Deleting old version of this product.

phrasetype.name: User Tools (global)
phrasetype.phrase: Avatars are small graphics that are displayed under user's username whenever he post.
Option 1 - Enter the URL to the Image on Another Website
If {1} have a custom avatar and you want to keep it as it is, leave the fields below as they are.
You may select one of the following pre-defined images to use as {1}'s avatar:
You may upload a new custom image using the controls below.
Note: if {1} has a custom avatar, then selecting this option will delete it.
Note: The maximum size of {1}'s custom image is {2}.
Note: The maximum size of {1}'s custom image is {2} by {3} pixels or {4} (whichever is smaller).
Note: The maximum size of {1}'s custom image is {2} by {3} pixels.
Profile pictures are small pictures of the user, which are displayed within user's profile.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Post here a valid link for the 'default violating avatar'.
Post here a valid link for the 'default violating profile picture'.
Post here the content of the 'default violating signature'.
